title: Grilled sardines with crab mayonnaise and dukkah
description: This dish is perfect for when you want something a bit special but pretty simple to pull together. The crab mayonnaise and dukkah can be prepared in advance and the fish cooks quickly so this is a great meal for an evening with friends.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz brown crab meat, passed through a sieve
½ small bunch coriander, finely chopped
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
8 large sardines, scaled, butterflied and tails left in tact
2 small Little Gem lettuce, cut into 4 lengthwise
